name: Wine Opener, Zinc Alloy Premium Wing Corkscrew Wine Bottle Opener with Multifunctional Bottles Opener, Sharp Corkscrew with Ergonomic Non-slip Wing Handle, Upgrade
about_this_item: UPGRADE MATERIAL - More durable and corrosion-resistant, the premium wing corkscrew is made of 100% Zinc Alloy
ALL-IN-ONE DESIGN - The multifunctional wing corkscrew built-in bottle opener is designed for wine beer and other bottles with caps or corks meet all your needs
MECHANICAL GEAR - Keep screw stays centered of the corks and prevent slippage, open bottles with ease
SHARP-EDGED SCREW - Keeps corks from breaking, no cork crumbling in your wine

THE BENENO ASSURANCE ‚Äì Every BENENO product is covered with a lifetime assurance. If you experience any issue with your BENENO product, please feel free to contact us for a replacement or refund. BENENO customer service team is here for you 24 hours every day

title: Works great
content: I has issues with a few corks when trying to extract them using my electric wine opener.  I am pretty sure that it was because I store the bottles upright for a few weeks instead of storing on their side.  Needless to say, I needed to extract the cork and only had the old style cork screw.  I decided that I really needed this type of corkscrew to ease the cork removal.  This product is well made, appears very durable and I was loving it from the first cork.  Wine is one of my passions so a good quality cork screw is a must.  This one fits my needs perfectly.  Highly recommend!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2024

title: Well made and easy to use
content: Over a decade ago, I needed a corkscrew for wine. Went to my local bed, bath and kitchen shop which doesn't exist anymore. Found a good wing corkscrew, which finally "bought the ranch". Needed a replacement.  Couldn't find the exact model I had. What to do? Went to Amazon (of course). Found a variety of wing corkscrews. Which one to choose?  Decided on this one. Looked well-designed (it is). And, comes nicely packaged. Got it home, tried it, and am happy with the purchase. NOTE: I do need to add this. The screw part of this (or any) corkscrew is REALLY sharp. Be careful using it. Keep it in a child-proof drawer or shelf. Enough said. Enjoy!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: When we read the glowing on-line reviews, we rolled our eyes and asked ‚Äúhow can a basic cork screw be anything but basic‚Äù?  Well, we‚Äôve been surprised.  This corkscrew is great!
